website_summaries.verdict: This rugged scooter offers a build that's likely to hold up to years of fun in the snow for youngsters, but if you need one for a specific weight limit, check out others we reviewed.
pros: Distances itself from the others with its IceVex treatment that protects the sturdy plastic construction from the elements
Easy to fold when not in use, mid-level price
cons: No indication of the weight limit it will accommodate, so it may not be practical for older children or adults

customer_reviews.title: Not usable
customer_reviews.text: Not usable at all. Bought it just give a try and based on reviews. While trying to figure out what to do with it saw another father and a son trying to use it to no avail - you can probably use it as a scooter on the snow, although it is hard to keep your foot on it as it is very slippery. If you try to go downhill you will most likely fall, this nothing as a snowboard and cannot be controlled properly. Both of us (another parent from above) ended up with this board thrown under the tree, usign sleds.
customer_reviews.author: Havelock

customer_reviews.title: Awesome little stand up sled
customer_reviews.text: The whole family is happy about this sled! It’s durable and light weight. And it must be strong because even my husband has ridden on it a few times.
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Was nice
customer_reviews.text: Thought this would have a little more sturdiness to it but will do for a 4 year old
customer_reviews.author: Mary Mc

customer_reviews.title: Worked Great
customer_reviews.text: This was better than I expected. Nice sled for a smaller child. My 6 year old could use it well and it worked great. He wanted to do it over and over.
customer_reviews.author: Kitty Flowers

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: Durable... as long as your child doesn’t put all his weight forward on the handle. Our first one broke that way.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki

customer_reviews.title: works good.
customer_reviews.text: works good, im just not good at balancing and im an adult and fell the first time i used it.
customer_reviews.author: floridagal

customer_reviews.title: Good training board.
customer_reviews.text: Good for 5-7 year olds, but also good for training 8 year olds and above before they move to a bigger board w/o handle. They can also skate on flat ground easily until they get use to it.
customer_reviews.author: George S.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy and fun product. My 8 yr old Grandson is having a blast in the snowy mountains of Pennsylvania!
customer_reviews.author: Marla

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Boys loved them . My boys are 14 and 12 and had a blast .
customer_reviews.author: Derek J Beaulac

customer_reviews.title: Fast service
customer_reviews.text: So glad that this arrived on time, as desired. Item is awesome, we all love to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Brooke C. Baker

product_meta.title: Slippery Racer Downhill Ski Scooter Snow Sled
product_meta.description: Slippery Racer sleds and toboggans are ahead of the curve in design, quality, and performance. Made with premium grade plastic and coated with SR's exclusive IceVex cold-resistant treatment, Slippery Racer sleds are built to withstand no matter how rugged the conditions. That's why Slippery Racer is the brand of choice for enthusiasts, hobbyists, and snow lovers everywhere!
feature_bullets: Built-in backside guard rails for smooth acceleration
Foldable handlebar for easy storage and transportation
